messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] TV movie thing
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone know when and on what channel the Adolf Hitler mini series is supposed to be. Dylan s liking WWII history right now and heard an advertisement on
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone know when and on what channel the Adolf Hitler mini series is
supposed to be.
Dylan's liking WWII history right now and heard an advertisement on the
radio for this thing but didn't hear when and where.

Deb L>>>>>>>>

NEW YORK (CBS) HITLER: THE RISE OF EVIL, a new four-hour mini-series event
starring Robert Carlyle ("The Full Monty," "Angela's Ashes") as Adolf Hitler,
will be broadcast Sunday, May 18 and Tuesday, May 20 (9:00-11:00 PM, ET/PT,
each night) on the CBS Television Network.


Laura D
